website_summaries.verdict: A canvas basket-style log carrier is easy to fold up, and makes it easy to haul wood in from outside.
pros: Bag has a large carrying capacity
Basket-style comes up the sides to keep debris from falling from the carrier
Sturdy, lightweight canvas material.Heavy-duty stitching handles
Can be used for carrying other awkward items such as easels
cons: Some users find the bag flimsy, and best for light duty

customer_reviews.title: Beware of 5 Star reviews
customer_reviews.text: Item is good, bought it to replace one that my dog chewed. However, I was shocked to see a coupon included that was good for 10% off another purchase if I left a five star review. This seems unethical at best. Your product should speak for itself. Buying good reviews seems like a horrible practice. Outside of the shady seller, I would have given the bag 4 stars
customer_reviews.author: NyChowd

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome! It makes carrying wood in so much easier. Yes, I still have to make several trips if I plan on bringing in enough wood to keep a fire going all day, but I had to do that anyway. Now it is just much easier. It is big enough to carry pretty large logs, and even longer logs than you would usually need for a fireplace or wood stove. It is very well made and seems very durable. It should last a long time if properly taken care of. Get one. You won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Awesome firewood tote!
customer_reviews.text: We burn a lot of fire wood and I have been using a Blue Ikea shopping tote to carry wood from the pile into the house. The handles are ready to rip out, so when I saw this tote I ordered it. It arrived very quickly and it is really heavy duty. The shape is great to hold the wood and it has a very wide "mouth" making it easy to put logs in, even in the dark. I expect to get years of use from this tote.
customer_reviews.author: Forewarned

customer_reviews.title: Much Better than Nothing...
customer_reviews.text: My son is so happy I bought this. He uses it every day to bring in wood. Thus far, it has a couple months on it and is holding up well. It isn't huge, but will bring in 6 or 7 large pieces of wood if you use both hands. One hand operation doesn't allow for much wood, as the handles are quite short. As far as strength and durability, it seems well made, and is lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Albert

customer_reviews.title: Fits My Needs
customer_reviews.text: Great product and Value. Used primarily for the Home and Camping. Don't count out Gardening and yard work for its use., just grab and clean up with all the small twigs and debris on those windy days from all the oak trees on the property. Don't need a shoulder strap, if I'm going to lug that kinda weight around I'll go for the tractor. This carrier handles all the weight its built for. I can say it handles 45,55+lbs with ease. So far no issues with any of the build quality. Love it 😎
customer_reviews.author: msmith

customer_reviews.title: Rope material that after a while completely unraveled and broke rendering the bag useless
customer_reviews.text: I have owned this bag for a full year now and have had to throw it away. The handles were made from a sort of rope material that after a while completely unraveled and broke rendering the bag useless as there are no straps there anymore to carry the wood, Extremely disappointing because I only used the bags maybe 6 times to haul wood inside and it was in perfect condition. I guess it needs a disclaimer that this bag will stop working after 1 yr
customer_reviews.author: Guinea Pig Lady

customer_reviews.title: This is NOT a cheaply made product.
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty material and it carries so much firewood. If you need a firewood carrier, than look no further...Amazing price too.
customer_reviews.author: C. Christensen

customer_reviews.title: Versatile log carrier
customer_reviews.text: Just the right size..had used ones that were bigger and Didnt like them. This Carrys sufficient wood when it is full and it is not too heavy. It folds up nicely, compact when folded..I stick it under my indoor wood rack when not in use..I used it to gather fallen wood branches..more efficient than carrying branches in arms..very happy with purchase..I would reccomend it to others
customer_reviews.author: Fran N.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Large and sturdy enough to carry an evening's worth of wood to the fireplace in one trip. Catches all the crumbs from the wood, too. UPDATE: After less than a season of use, 2 or 3 times a week, a series of small holes have appeared in the bottom of the carrier. Reduced my initial 5-star rating to 2 stars. Handles could be longer, too.
customer_reviews.author: WLM

customer_reviews.title: What a good firewood tote
customer_reviews.text: We used it over the winter about 4 months before we write this. It is one sturdy, good wood carrier. We have a free standing stove in the livingroom that heats pretty much our entire house (2800sq) We had our own tree cut and stacked them out side the garage. This carrier make it so easy to bring just right amount to last for a day. We are a bit order and not so strong to carry a full load so we do twice a day. It's light weight and easy to clean. It's a good price. I don't think I can even sew this good for that price. Gotta get one for my neighbor for this xmas.
customer_reviews.author: Cielbleu

customer_reviews.title: Wonderfully nice!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using a smaller one from one of those big box home stores and saw this one on here and decided to buy it. I’m so glad I did as it’s much sturdier and holds more wood. It has Velcro handles and a belt strap to tightly secure the wood for big loads. Once I have the wood inside I just unfold this out and leave the wood stacked up on it ready to put in the fireplace. I would recommend this over any at those local big box stores.
customer_reviews.author: B Town

customer_reviews.title: Does its job like its supposed to
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product in lieu of a cart for carrying firewood from the shed to the fireplace. This does the job fine. It can be a little awkward to maneuver when full, but that is because it holds a lot of wood. It looks good and seems very sturdy. We just started firewood carrying season, and so far it is a champ. Well worth the money. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Holds a good amount of firewood
customer_reviews.text: Material is heavy duty waxed canvas that looks like it will last a long time. It holds a reasonable amount of firewood. Much larger and it would get too heavy. The ability to close the tote with the sewn in strap is something I doubt I will ever use and I would prefer not to be there, but it doesn't interfere with use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recommended firewood tote
customer_reviews.text: For its intended purpose I’d say this firewood tote does a pretty decent job. It seems well made, including a good strong strap that should hold up to carry heavy logs. I actually bought it for another purpose hoping it would work for me (carrying bags of groceries in from the car), but unfortunately it’s not designed for this purpose (which I knew but decided to try anyway). The ‘openings’ at each end were just not conducive to my needs. If I needed another firewood carrier I’d likely buy this item.
customer_reviews.author: Raptor

customer_reviews.title: Bang for the buck!
customer_reviews.text: Love this wood carrier! Only prob I have with it is getting the little Velcro strap (to hold both handles) to meet—it’s a little to narrow to catch...otherwise, it is exactly what it claims to be: waxed canvas....it will last as long as I need for it to, especially silly if I don’t leave it out in the rain!
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Very useful, could be just a bit more durable
customer_reviews.text: Love the product overall and good size (plenty long and decently wide/tall). I can easily carry about double what I could carry without it (using one to place and another to carry) which ends up being about 6-7 large pieces. I just ordered my second one because the first one has a hole after one year of light use. I'm still using the original, but I'm guessing it won't last much longer. Again, very good product and I do recommend it... I just wish it was slightly more durable.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Mostofi

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the money spent
customer_reviews.text: Although we are just hitting wood season now in Michigan I can tell this carrier is going to work out well. I haven’t used it more than a handful of times but the quality seems very good for the price. I’ve loved it up with large logs and it definitely makes it easier to carry them down the basement stairs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well, but questionable durability.
customer_reviews.text: It worked well at first, but after 1 month of use, a hole developed by a strap seam. The product works well, but durability is questionable.
customer_reviews.author: Braden T.

customer_reviews.title: Good Price, Pretty durable
customer_reviews.text: Have used it for a whole winter season and is holding up pretty well. Im not easy on stuff and overall I’d say its pretty durable. On the inside plastic like surface where the logs are loaded there are a couple very small holes caused by sharp edged wood i just throw in. .They are not the type of hole that will get any bigger. Also, they are not all the way through, it’s just a plastic lining on the inside.
customer_reviews.author: No Cheating

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: The wax canvas is heavy duty. I'm sure its going to last a long time. I've been using it for several months now. It holds plenty of wood. I don't use the cinch straps, that's too much messing around. We get a lot of snow where we're at. When I bring wood in the house there is always snow left in the carrier. I just fold it up and set it beside the stove. It sheds water like a champ.
customer_reviews.author: Dread head

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Seems like it's pretty heavy duty, and I've used it a lot of times already, it limits the amount of times that I have to go out to get wood and bring in for the fireplace instead of carrying two logs at a time I can usually get 8 to 10. I can also grab both handles with one hand and open and close the door instead of having to put a log down if I'm carrying a log in each hand just to open and then close the door.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy D.

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking and very strong
customer_reviews.text: I call this my wood purse. It sure comes in handy and does what it's made to do. It seems very durable and I expect it to last through many camping trips. We burn a fair amount of wood when we camp and I think it's going to make it much easier to carry all the wood from the truck to the fire pit.
customer_reviews.author: Bantau

customer_reviews.title: Good for a few uses
customer_reviews.text: The canvas parts of this bag are durable but the lining is very fragile and did not hold up to carrying loads of logs. The inside of the bag developed small holes after just a few used. These firewood carriers need to be durable and last long.
customer_reviews.author: Frillz

customer_reviews.title: Useful but not durable.  Season and a half of moderate use
customer_reviews.text: We got a season and a half out of it before the handles tore. The main bag is holding up ok(some wear but no tears). The handles are on the short side but usable. We have a pair and evenly load up each so we are balanced when walking. The handles started fraying at the end of last year, and I got one trip out of it this season when both sets tore almost at the same time. We have a efficient stove, so less than 50 uses before they tore, each trip being 4-6 logs a bag. Not heavy duty at all.
customer_reviews.author: anon015677

customer_reviews.title: Too Small
customer_reviews.text: If you put more than 4-5 pieces of wood in this duffel, it is impossible to carry it with both handles in one hand as suggested in picture. Much smaller capacity than I thought it would have based on photo. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: N Pringle

customer_reviews.title: Very Well Made Product
customer_reviews.text: Love this firewood tote...I load it up and haul the wood into the house and load the Canvas Tote and wood into my fireplace wood rack... the handles fit perfectly over the rack to keep the Tote open for easy access to the wood... this keeps all the bark and sawdust in the tote... so there's no mess.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Roberts

customer_reviews.title: so much better thatn I expected
customer_reviews.text: This thing is so handy! been using over a year. due to hard usage I have a couple of small rips, but they don't run. Price is so well worth it. can cary 4 or 5 very large logs (pie cut) 16" x 6 x 6 or larger. only way to improve would be a bit heavier material and a few more inches of handle when i over load it.
customer_reviews.author: tfansoi

customer_reviews.title: Well made log hauler
customer_reviews.text: I have two of these and they've held up well so far. I cannot see anything in the materials/workmanship that indicates that it may fail early. They make moving split wood from the stack to the house much easier and cleaner on the clothes (I can haul more than I can by just loading up my arm).
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: As expected, the material is a little too thin.
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these so I can walk with a balanced load, 1 in each hand. These work great and are a vast improvement over the boxes and bins I had been using. My only hang up is the overall quality. It’s not bad and I haven’t had any issues. The material and nylon handles are of a thinner material than I would like. I expect these will last about 3-5 years with moderate use.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What We Were Looking for
customer_reviews.text: We received our firewood sling and I was pleasingly surprised to see how well and how sturdy it is made. Our wood pile is at the back fence and our fire pit is on the patio. Lugging several armloads of firewood was going to be time consuming, so I decided to see if I could find a sling or a tote of some sort to carry one load rather than have us make several trips. We are very pleased. The construction of the sling is so well made that it is going to last a lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: Emerald Haven

customer_reviews.title: It carries a lot of wood and holds up well
customer_reviews.text: Needed a way to carry wood from the wood pile into the house and this was the pefect size. Not so large that the bundles were hard to lift, but large enough to carry a load that would keep the fireplace going for the night. Seems to hold up well.
customer_reviews.author: C. A. Rake

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: My first review. I just received the product and did my first use. Very well constructed great price. I was able to carry a large quantity of wood easily. You can also have another person help by taking one eof the handles. Looks easy to clean will update once I've used it more. update: still working well no complaints. The sides help keep the wood bits from falling on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Percy R Bloodworth

customer_reviews.title: Excellent For Moving Firewood
customer_reviews.text: My old leather log toter I got many years ago finally bit the dust so I ordered two of these and I'm not sorry I did. They hold as much wood as I can physically carry and look like they'll last a long time due to their sturdy construction and heavy canvas duck material.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Colombini

customer_reviews.title: For the price can't be beat!
customer_reviews.text: Installed a wood stove and needed a carrier. I love the "sides" that it has. They help keep the mess inside the log carrier. I've filled it up to the point where it's hard to carry and really put it thru the paces. I got it on sale for around $13. I've only used it for about a month so I can't comment on durability, but it seems well made and should hold up for some time. If you're reading this and in need of a carrier and don't want to spend $40 on one like me, go ahead and buy this you'll be happy you did!
customer_reviews.author: SUSAN NOLL

customer_reviews.title: Great gift, does the job, looks good
customer_reviews.text: Got for Father's Day gift for hubby. It works great to fetch wood from the woodpile for our backyard fire pit. WAY better than awkwardly trying to grab a log or two with your hands. Saves trips, and looks good. What's not to like?
customer_reviews.author: 3kidsathome

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This is fantastic and is a bargain for the price. It hold a ton of wood , probably more than the average person can physically carry. The only thing , they should have used wooden or plastic handles so the fabric doesn't hurt your hands. Other than that , this is a bargain
customer_reviews.author: Dan Miller

customer_reviews.title: Very Strong/Very Nice Product
customer_reviews.text: This log carrier is strong. Very strong. It has changed the way I bring firewood into my house. It has one tiny hole in it because I dropped a heavy piece of firewood in it when I was loading the wood. Regardless, I'm careful now and it has been perfect. So good, I just bought another one to have in case this one ever wears out...maybe in 10 years.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: This is a must if you have a fireplace. Wish I had bought these a long time ago.
customer_reviews.text: These are great, you can carry a double arm load of firewood and still get the door, The thing I like is I can bring in firewood and leave it in the bag without a mess on the floor or hearth. It seems to be very durable and is holding up very well. I liked it so much I bought 2 more for our other fireplaces.
customer_reviews.author: My reviews

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I got this bag in December, and I love it. It holds a lot of firewood, and doesn't feel like it's going to break. It holds long pieces and short pieces and is easy to load and unload. It also collapses and folds easily so it doesn't take up much space.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't let the squirrels get to it.
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price. Sturdy, but will rip or puncture if subjected to sufficient insult. Also: Do not leave this out where the squirrels can get to it! They will destroy the cloth handles (for nesting material). I had to order a new one because of this.
customer_reviews.author: Wullow Still

customer_reviews.title: Great log carrier
customer_reviews.text: Have only had it for a few months so I can not comment on long term durability but it definately seems well made and sturdy. I like this one compared to my other one (where the ends where pocketed) because it is easy to handle the wood. I use it for 18 and 22" logs without an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Matteo

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Nice tote, handles could be longer to allow more firewood to fit. However this seems very well made. I thought about buying two, but you can't easily see down and pick up so getting in through doors would be difficult. One works well and is cleaner than just carrying a load.
customer_reviews.author: Jam

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last long.
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised to see holes appearing in it after about 2 months. Next winter I'll pay more for better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Detached Observor

customer_reviews.title: Tough little wood carrier so far...
customer_reviews.text: For now I’m going to refrain from giving all stars. I live in Maine for only a portion of the year. So I need a little more time to tell you exactly how tough this carrier is. Needless to say I need a wood carrier. It’s been pretty helpful so far. I refuse to pay what LL Bean charges. I would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: lifts a heavy load
customer_reviews.text: This was everything I could hope for and more. Professional appearance while providing a Paul Bunion like ability to lift and carry the heaviest of loads. Babe himself would be challenged to do better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Husband approved!
customer_reviews.text: Husband came home from hunting in another state. His friend had one of these & he raved about it. Husband now has one of his own & loves it. Carries more than you think. Handles are comfy enough. I'm unable to attest to how long it'll last yet but suspect at least a few years & we have fires year round.
customer_reviews.author: amy f

customer_reviews.title: Awkward to carry loaded with wood
customer_reviews.text: Very awkward to carry when loaded. Hurts my back. Wish it had a should strap. It seems durable but i cant use it.
customer_reviews.author: B.Brad

customer_reviews.title: Really durable
customer_reviews.text: We used it for our our fireplace this winter. It works wonderfully! We can bring in big loads to stack on our wood rack. It folds up flat to keep inside neatly. This will last multiple winters for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Jax D

customer_reviews.title: Works great, good price
customer_reviews.text: So far my husband loves this tote. Makes it so much easier to carry a large load of firewood from our garage to our apartment on third floor. Would recommend to anyone even if not carrying wood a long distance like us.
customer_reviews.author: UKPA

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my father, who's old wood toter had seen better days, so I got this one, my father was very pleased and happy with the product. He liked that the ends come up to keep the debris from falling out when he's bringing the wood in from the outside. His old one didn't have that and bits would fall out. Great product, well done.
customer_reviews.author: uhly

customer_reviews.title: A must have for anyone carrying firewood
customer_reviews.text: This canvas bag was so great I had to buy one for a Christmas gift for a family member. We have had ours for 2 years now and use it ALL the time in the winter to carry in firewood for the fireplace. It keeps the mess of the bark chips from making a trail through your home and you can carry more than just a few pieces at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Momina

customer_reviews.title: A life savor!!
customer_reviews.text: We heat our home with wood and are older, so carrying it in from outside and trying to open the door with an armload of wood is difficult. This is so much easier to carry our wood in and also don't get dirt and wood chips on our clothes as we used to fill our arms and have to hold the wood against our body. A must have if you have to carry wood!!!
customer_reviews.author: Susan R.

customer_reviews.title: Falls apart after ONE YEAR of limited useage <25!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Well, after ONE-YEAR of LIMITED use, (less than 25 loads), this bag is FALLING APART! MANY holes developing in sides and bottom. Plastic liner is falling apart, MAY last 1 more season. Looking elsewhere now for replacement. VERY DISAPPOINTING!
customer_reviews.author: T. Morrow

customer_reviews.title: It is tough and big
customer_reviews.text: I was using the Costco bags to bring in wood and they broke as they could hold more wood than they could support. Handles broke ort bag ripped. This one is big and will accept logs that are longer than standard size but fit in to the wood stove just fine. It is a tough tote.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Much better way to carry wood
customer_reviews.text: We needed something that would fit a decent amount of wood to store in our house without having to make ten trips. This carrier is great, and allows my husband or me to load, carry, and stock wood without much effort.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Pennie

customer_reviews.title: Well made product and great for moving things around house and garage for general ...
customer_reviews.text: Well made product and great for moving things around house and garage for general storage. Also for holding longer gardening equipment such as pruners to have ready to take to yard when needed. Large capacity for moving stuff around. Will buy again
customer_reviews.author: Louise

customer_reviews.title: Stands behind product!
customer_reviews.text: I was so happy to get this, used it as soon as I got it. It got a small hole in it. The company was sending me a new one almost as soon as I told them. So happy. I got the new one, used it, prefect. Not only great product, but great company. I have been telling everyone. Great buy. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Convenient, no mess
customer_reviews.text: I’ve transported 2.5-3 cords of wood from my shed to my fireplace with this so far (not a far distance, maybe 30’). Judging by the amount of wear it has now, I should be able to make it another 2-3 cords before it falls apart. I think that’s acceptable for it’s price point and convenience of its design. Zero mess with wood pieces during transport.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value but smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: Great value but a little smaller than expected. Wish the sides were good 6" longer but overall great log carrier especially for the money. Will see how it holds up over time.
customer_reviews.author: MVB Creations

customer_reviews.title: Great for keeping your wood neat by fireplace or tent.
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't use this for hauling heavy loads of wood back and forth from the forest. There's better, thicker canvas totes for that, but this is great for keeping your wood/kindling together in your hot tent, or home fireplace.
customer_reviews.author: Garehead

customer_reviews.title: Durable,lightweight,goodprce,handy-highly Recom. !
customer_reviews.text: This is great! Carries lots of wood from outside to inside fireplace. Is sturdy, good price - keeps floors cleaner- less mess from wood chips falling- lightweight- just handy !! Just what we needed!
customer_reviews.author: Sing a joyful noise.

customer_reviews.title: Why didn’t I buy this years ago
customer_reviews.text: Great size. Super durable material. The handles have a Velcro “closure” as well as the strap over the top. Great for moving wood inside. Been using it for a month or so and I kick myself for not getting one years ago. Easier than stacking the wood up my arm like a cafe waitress with dishes.
customer_reviews.author: Gas Man

customer_reviews.title: Good for a season or two.
customer_reviews.text: If you do a lot of burning, don’t expect it to last for more than one season. If it lasts longer then that’s a bonus... for the price, one season is fine with me. It has done the job. There are tears in the main material that holds the wood but overall this thing has not failed me throughout this one burning season. I would consider my use to be “normal”.
customer_reviews.author: Ruby

customer_reviews.title: Well-designed product at a great price point
customer_reviews.text: Nice big log holder with sturdy straps and comfortable handles. Great value for the money. The design is thoughtful. No sawdust or scraps falling out as you traipse through the house bringing your firewood inside!
customer_reviews.author: EastCoastFL

customer_reviews.title: log sling
customer_reviews.text: It appears to be a mid weight and have good nylon straps. I do like the the fact that it has some ends so that you don't drop a trail of bark as you go into the house.
customer_reviews.author: Gregg Camp

customer_reviews.title: Best carrier I've ever had.  Large, sturdy, contains mess from bark and saw dust.
customer_reviews.text: Got this carrier right before the big cold snap hit, and have already carried a cord of wood with it. Huge improvement over former open ended carrier. Unless you are a powerlifter, this carries all the wood you would want to carry in one load. Closed ends catch all the bark and sawdust that rubs off in the carrier. Seems really well-made, and straps are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Biking Papa

customer_reviews.title: Tough and Durable
customer_reviews.text: Time will tell but the material is tough, both the handles and sling carry, and it appears well stitched. It appears that it will hold up for a few seasons and seems good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: woodstock

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver product, nice quality, great price!
customer_reviews.text: My wood is far from my house and we have to climb stairs to get to it. This item was a lifesaver! It holds a good amount of wood and it makes carrying it down stairs manageable. Very happy with purchase and the price was also very reasonable, as it’s a quality made item.
customer_reviews.author: Rose Petal

customer_reviews.title: A well made carrying bag
customer_reviews.text: This is one tough bag. Quality of workmanship is very evident. I have already carried several loads of wood in this bag. I would recommend this wood carrier.
customer_reviews.author: nicknfla2

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: This works well, but the photo with all the logs must have twig-sized logs. In my experience, this holds about 4-5 large pieces of split wood (sorry not to have size specifics, but if you have a typical wood burning stove, this bag will hold about 5 pieces.)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it. Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: We have had it for 3 years I have filled it with oak to the point that I had to use both hands and waddle with it! I'm really rough on stuff. If it ever dies ill buy another one
customer_reviews.author: Richard A. Tully

customer_reviews.title: Just made our 2nd purchase
customer_reviews.text: We heat our dining/liv/kitchen with a fireplace insert. It is cold here from Oct to May, so we haul wood inside daily. This carrier works terrifically. Many of our logs are longer than the carrier is wide, so we fold down the short sides as needed. I purchased a 2nd carrier so hubby will have less trips to make. I bought a carrier just for me so I can help him.
customer_reviews.author: SAM

customer_reviews.title: Very handy carrier for firewood
customer_reviews.text: Very efficient for moving firewood from the pile into the house. I used to pile it up on my arms but this carrier makes it more efficient.
customer_reviews.author: Olga

customer_reviews.title: Nice carrier
customer_reviews.text: I have used this bag for approximately 10 trips of firewood. I previously used a milk crate. I like that the small pieces don’t get lost to and from wood pile. You can load it up quite a lot, although if you do you will definitely need two hands to carry the load because handles will be to far apart to grab. Which is not a con, just a fact. So far it has held up great, no deteriorating.
customer_reviews.author: mjb

customer_reviews.title: It is sturdy and useful
customer_reviews.text: It's much easier to transport wood (or kindling) in this carrier. Many less trips in/out of the house are required. The carrier is very sturdy and I hope will last many, many years.
customer_reviews.author: Bentley's Folks

customer_reviews.title: Nice heavy duty bag for fire wood
customer_reviews.text: We go camping and always used to throw some wood in a big trash can but it takes up way too much room. Found this bag and it's perfect. Pros: Save space offer the trash can Heavy duty Roomy Easy to clean out Cons: When fully loaded outta heavy Need two people to carry (but we needed two for the trash can also).
customer_reviews.author: The ATM Guy

customer_reviews.title: Great firewood carrier
customer_reviews.text: Really like this product - was making quite a mess bring firewood into living room, and this carrier solved that problem. Especially helpful for tinder.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Firewood Tote
customer_reviews.text: I have never owned a firewood carrier and boy I was missing out. This makes it much easier, less messy, and I can carry more wood at a time. This bag is very strong it's nice looking by the fireplace and I could not believe for the price how expensive it feels and looks. I would never carry wood by hand again this canvas log tote will make your life easier.
customer_reviews.author: L. Donohoe

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for bringing in logs daily
customer_reviews.text: Great bag for hauling logs! Kinda wish it would stay open when loading logs (sides fall in at times...i.e. not stiff), but other than that, it works perfectly. Have only used it this winter so far, but has held up great considering how many times we use it a day.
customer_reviews.author: Ish

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my use
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy waxed canvas tote for firewood and if you buy the accompanying stove- side rack it fits right in it and the handles loop over the sides. I’ll be using this a lot this winter.
customer_reviews.author: A. Kevin Mccue

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Excellent especially for the price. My wood is stacked in the carport and was having to carry the logs in arms dealing with not only the mess of it getting on clothes but having to keep it balanced and together plus maneuver for opening and closing doors into the house. With the carrier I put around 6 logs in it and carry it as easily as a duffle bag.
customer_reviews.author: Brock72833

customer_reviews.title: Hubs thought this was a ridiculous purchase -
customer_reviews.text: Until he used it. No more dirty clothes, no sprinkle of woodchips throughout the house, easiest to carry wet wood, etc. excellent choice * recommend!
customer_reviews.author: sophiegirl

customer_reviews.title: Great wood carrying bag.
customer_reviews.text: Great for carrying wood to the deck and back door.
customer_reviews.author: David F. Rice

customer_reviews.title: Great Wood Carrier!
customer_reviews.text: This is a simple product that helps greatly with transferring wood around. This quality of this carrier is very good and the materials seem very durable. Didn’t know how much I needed this until I used it a few times. The straps help with securing load.
customer_reviews.author: Khaled Haider

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: This is great to bring wood in for our stove and on the deck for our fire pit. Saves your arms and less trips!
customer_reviews.author: CM Ledbetter

customer_reviews.title: Great size and value. Sturdy too
customer_reviews.text: Great wood carrier. Very sturdy waxed canvas. Reinforced handles. Will carry about 8 good size (6”) cuts of wood.
customer_reviews.author: K dir

customer_reviews.title: Strong, comfortable, holds lots of wood at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two so I can carry firewood up my 22 stairs and these work great. Very strong with good handles and I like how the ends of the U are closed so the wood is secure.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Tommm

customer_reviews.title: This thing works!
customer_reviews.text: For the price? This log caddy is pretty awesome. Unless you're a giant, this thing will hold about as much as an average person would want to bring into the house at one time. And it holds the wood cleanly and discreetly. Definitely a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: DRunner

customer_reviews.title: Tough & Attractive
customer_reviews.text: This carrier is nice and roomy for carrying a good sized stack of wood, it is well-made and sturdy, and is attractive enough to leave sitting on the hearth.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This is the third one I have bought. The first ended up too close to the fire, the second I left out and a mouse made a home in it. I love this tote, it holds a ton of wood is very easy to carry with the very sturdy canvas straps. very rugged . I would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: joy scott

customer_reviews.title: Just wish it was a little bigger
customer_reviews.text: Nice and long bag for bringing in firewood from the stack, but doesn't hold a lot. Sturdy and attractive. Holds all the bark and pieces that fall off the logs.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin B

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says
customer_reviews.text: We got this to help carry wood into the house to use without leaving a trail of debris behind. It works well and is easily stored. We've used it multiple times and its durable. I would recommend it and buy another if needed.
customer_reviews.author: firemansflame28

customer_reviews.title: lifesaver for camping!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for gathering firewood on camping trips. Had several people use it over the course of a weekend and got rave reviews. Sturdy and rugged. I'll bring this on every camping trip I go on...
customer_reviews.author: T. Barnella

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and good looking
customer_reviews.text: We've been using this 3 or 4 times a month...mostly on weekends. It carries quite a lot and has been great. Looks nice too. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Moemoev

customer_reviews.title: Camping Time Saver!
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing. No more having my wife pile wood in my cradled arms. Seems pretty durable, I’ve used it on several camping trips with no issues. A simple camping luxury.
customer_reviews.author: Carefulbuyer

customer_reviews.title: A great product as designed!!️ Great job folks.
customer_reviews.text: Great heavy duty fabric and stitching. I fill with 24” red oak and hickory logs. (About 75lbs. at a time.) East to handle. Daily use for logs and kindling.
customer_reviews.author: EddieMac

customer_reviews.title: This bag is Huge, sturdy solid quality!
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag! I needed something to haul wood behind the front seats for a camping trip and this was more functional than a tub. The sides are NOT high (obviously) but it is a long bag that holds a ton of wood. You wont be disappointed and for the cost, it's basically a give away!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley N. Wilkins

customer_reviews.title: A must for camping
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for collecting fire wood at campsites. Very well made and carries alot of wood.
customer_reviews.author: Utahcamper

customer_reviews.title: great price, great product
customer_reviews.text: somehow between last winter and this one we lost our log carrier....I blame him, he blames me :-). we repurchased this one because it is sturdy, large and a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: A good wood carrier
customer_reviews.text: So far so good on using this canvas bag though I do worry about it over the long run. It holds a decent amount of wood, though I do wish it was slight bigger.
customer_reviews.author: New York

Firewood carrier, can be fully loaded with long handle, is large enough to bring in a nice sized supply of birchwood logs without it being too heavy. Don't have to make several trips to carry firewood.

Very sturdy light canvas material: Canvas firewood holder,woven fabric inside, christmas log tote carrier with heavy duty stitching handles. Light portable firewood carrier carrying tote bag, no more scratches from wood. Works good for hauling in wood for the fire place, to carry logs from outdoor firewood log rack round to inside firewood holder by ash bucket for indoor fireplace hearth and wood burning stove. No rips after a season of burning.

Home bucket use to clean up the woods around the house where the wheelbarrow doesn't go, the firewood carrier and holder makes it easier to bring in armfuls of wood from outside woodpiles. The ends overlap slightly which keeps any small pieces from falling out. Bring in the wood without a mess, no rips or tears on the grounds, the floor, or on clothing.

Firewood tote and holder, cloth firewood carrier, easy to fold up and store away for indoor firewood rack. It folds up (okay, wads up or crushes down) compactly for storage when not in use.
